name: CHEAT SHEET WINGMAN!
description:
Tonight you are the worlds greatest wingman; a DDR MACHINE! Your goal is to help out our friend here who's on his very first date. He wants to impress with his skills on the DDR machine but unfortunately he's just the worst dancer ever! He pretty much just aimlessly stomping his feet wherever he pleases.  However, we can work with this! It's up to you to sync up the arrows to wherever he's going to randomly step next! You're here to make him look good on his date so let's not fail him now!

(Use the A S D keys to send arrows done the left, center, and right lanes respectively!)

Art by: Jose (Lone_Stranger on itch.io) and Darby

Programming by: Donovan (allcrazyman101 on itch.io) and Zach (zosman on itch.io)
